title: rengar disabled for over 48 hours
body:
when the hek is rengar coming back online 
the day i choose to buy him he goes offline due to a bug -.-
is there any news on how long it will take to fix?

and is there somewhere that i can check progress?

replies.body:
[You can check here, the notice will disappear when he is reenabled,](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)

As for when he will be back online, whenever they nail down and fix the bug. There's never a specific timeline for these sorts of issues, all you'll get is an ASAP. They'll reenable him as soon as he's fixed :)
